title: 早上还是轻音乐最好嘛~[内涵BGM]
author: xiaobaicai
txt_content:
好久不发音乐帖了，来一发~  红帽哥你太帅了~

http://www.51119.com/play/swf/02.swf?file=http://up.yuedisk.com/wl/url/dbbpniNxKg/247549/yuedisk.mp3&width=150&songVolume=100&backColor=&frontColor=&autoStart=true&repeatPlay=true&showDownload=false
